emissions.closest_match_explanation: Exact match not found for 'fresh pasta', but 'pasta, raw' is a valid broader category for fresh pasta (Rule 2). It is the least processed pasta option available and thus the best match (Rule 4).
Exact match found for 'garlic, raw' which matches '2 cloves of garlic' directly (Rule 1 and 8). It is the least processed form available (Rule 4).
Exact match found for 'onion, raw' which matches '1 onion' directly (Rule 1 and 8). It is the least processed onion option (Rule 4).
Exact match found for 'asparagus, green, raw' which matches '1 bundle of green asparagus' directly (Rule 1 and 8). It is the least processed asparagus option (Rule 4).
Exact match found for 'squash, raw' which matches '1 Squash' directly (Rule 1 and 8). It is the least processed squash option (Rule 4).
Exact match found for 'basil, fresh' which matches '1 large handful of fresh basil' directly (Rule 1 and 8). It is the least processed basil option (Rule 4).
Multiple cream options available. 'cream, whipping, 38 % fat' is chosen as it matches the typical cream type and has a higher emission than cultured cream but less than ice cream (Rule 4 and 5).
Exact match found for 'cheese, hard, parmesan, 32 % fidm.' which matches '6 tbsp grated parmesan' directly (Rule 1 and 8).

Exact match found for 'cheese, semihard, mozzarella, 30 % fidm.' which matches '1 handful of mozzarella' directly (Rule 1 and 8). It has higher emissions than mozzarella sticks or goat cheese (Rule 5).
Multiple oil options available. 'olive oil' chosen as it is a common oil and has the highest emission factor among oils listed (Rule 4 and 5).
